The amount of functional 21-hydroxylase enzyme determines the severity of the disorder. People with NCAH have CYP21A2 mutations that result in the production of reduced amounts of the enzyme, but more enzyme than the classic form of congenital adrenal hyperplasia.",GARD,Non-classic congenital adrenal hyperplasia due to 21-hydroxylase deficiency
